title: The 30 most accurate interpretations of seeing a dream about a lock and buying it in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a lock in a dream by senior scholars? The lock in a dream has many interpretations and the symbols of its colors and sizes in the dream are very important, so it seems that all age groups see it in their dreams and that is why we decided on an Egyptian website to present Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of this symbol as well as the interpretation of Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen and others. We will break the lock code with you in the dream through the following. I am locked in the dream. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of the lock dream shows seven signs. This symbol is one of the symbols that expresses the virgin girl who has not been touched by people, and perhaps the vision indicates that the dreamer will soon meet an unmarried girl. Trust is One of the meanings of this symbol means that the dreamer is the person who can protect the trust he has in order to deliver it to its owners without spoiling or losing it. There is no doubt that the quality of trust is one of the greatest qualities of our Master, the Messenger of God, and if someone adorns it, this is a sign that he takes the Messenger as a good example, and thus avoids bad deeds. He has everything that is good for morals and values, and the dreamer’s honesty is not limited only to preserving material things. In other words, it is divided into two types: The first type: material trust, which is money, clothes, important papers, or any other material that is important to the person. The second type: moral honesty means keeping secrets and not divulging them regardless of the circumstances. The result of the dreamer keeping the trust is that it will increase its value in the eyes of people and they will appreciate it, in addition to increasing its value with God, because a believer’s cover for his brother is a great thing in the eyes of God and the dreamer. He will be rewarded with countless good deeds. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. The lock in the vision can be made with more than one raw material. If the dreamer sees an iron lock, this symbol has two meanings: The first meaning: that the dreamer discovers and retains a lot of information, and this is a sign that he is a person who loves knowledge in general and insists on developing his cultural and educational level from time to time, and the vision in this is the dreamer’s obedience to the command of his Lord. Which appeared in that noble verse (Read in the name of your Lord who created). The second concept: The dreamer works to protect his acquaintances and relatives while awake. He can guarantee them in many banking and government transactions that no harm will come to them, and he can stand on their behalf to act in any important matter that concerns him. In order to prevent their feelings from escaping from others, this indicates his courage and great love for his relatives. If the dreamer sees in a dream a lock made of wood, the vision carries three symbols: The first code: He does not treat others equally in the sense that hypocrisy is inherent in his personality. Second: His statements are not decisive, as he is a hesitant person, and he may say something and then deny it after a while. Some jurists have described him by saying that his statements are not unanimous and are not taken into consideration, and that is a wavering commandment. It causes several crises for him and for everyone who faces him, which will be resolved by stabilizing the situation and not changing words and promises. The third symbol: It indicates one of the worst personal qualities, which is bribery and giving up one’s right in exchange for obtaining

title: Interpretation of seeing the desert in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the desert by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said about seeing the desert in a dream that it indicates the harshness of life and the difficulties faced by the dreamer, in addition to his exposure to loneliness. Desert sand shows money and livelihood and seeing water in the desert. It shows hope and a vision of the desert. Without water indicates failure and loss. Ibn Sirin also said: Whoever sees desert insects such as scorpions and snakes, this portends evil and evil to the dreamer. Also, seeing a sandstorm in the desert indicates intense anger. Life and whoever sees himself walking in the desert in a dream, this is evidence of loss and misfortunes, and if this desert absorbs him, this indicates that he is living a decent life with his family. Interpretation of seeing the desert by Ibn ShaheenIbn Shaheen indicated in his interpretation of seeing the desert in a dream that when a person sees himself walking In a vast desert that extends to infinity, this is evidence that he will suffer from serious injustice and whoever sees himself walking in the desert and its greenery. The colors around it indicate achieving goodness, livelihood, and luck for the dream owner. Interpretation of seeing the desert for a single woman: When a girl who has not yet married sees the desert in a dream, this indicates moving to a new life, either through marriage or travel. A girl who sees herself walking in the desert with water, palm trees, and dates, then this is evidence of her marriage to a generous and moral person. If the girl sees snakes in the desert, this proves that she was injured and ordered a period of hardship in her life. Interpretation of seeing the desert for a married woman. When a married woman sees the desert in her dream, this is evidence That there was an evil and hypocritical person in her life. If a woman sees snakes and scorpions in the desert, this is evidence of her husband’s mistreatment of her. If a married woman finds water in the desert, this is a sign of pregnancy and childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about the desert for a pregnant woman: Seeing the desert in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of hypocrisy around her, but if she sees the desert with water in it, this indicates the ease of childbirth for her.

title: A husband marries his wife in a dream

preview.html: If a man sees ease in a husband marrying his wife in a dream, this indicates his readiness for problems and success in his new affairs. Interpretation of seeing a husband marrying his wife in a dream about a single girl. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that someone close to her is marrying his wife. It appears that this person will undertake some The great responsibilities in his life during this time. And seeing the unmarried woman whose fiancée was marrying his wife in a dream made her sad. It indicates some big things that this single woman is going through at this time in her life. And if she is unmarried and sees that the person close to her is marrying his wife to a woman Ugly in a dream. Here it appears that there are many problems that a single girl faces in her life, and God knows best. And an unmarried girl who sees that a man is marrying his wife in front of her and a woman is beautiful in a dream. This is evidence of the kindness and strength that this single woman will obtain in her life. And seeing An unmarried woman witnesses her husband marrying again in a dream. It indicates the great success that this single woman will witness and experience, God willing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a woman married to her husband. Interpretation of watching a husband marry his wife in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband He marries another woman and she is beautiful in a dream. It indicates the good things that a married woman will have in her life. If she testifies that she saw her husband forced to marry a woman with bad appearance and morals. Here it indicates the problems that this married woman will go through in her life. And seeing that the woman The married woman was looking for many reasons to get rid of her husband from marrying again. It indicates that her husband does not care about her at this time. What if the married woman saw that she was marrying her husband to a woman of good character. Here it appears that she and her husband are free from trouble during this time, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. It also indicates that a married woman sees her husband marrying another woman. It explains the presence of a great responsibility that a married woman and her husband live with at this time. Interpretation of seeing a husband marrying his wife in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees in a dream that her husband is marrying her in a dream and she is sad. Here it indicates great fear. What a divorced woman is experiencing in her life at this time of her ex-husband’s marriage. And if a divorced woman sees in a dream that her ex-husband is marrying a woman close to her, this is an indication of a great responsibility that falls on her ex-husband’s shoulders in life, and God knows best. Likewise, a divorced woman sees her husband marrying a good-looking woman. And morals. It shows the good things that this divorced woman will see in her life. Or if the divorced woman sees that she is trying to marry her ex-husband to an ugly-looking woman with bad morals. It indicates that there are major problems and tensions that the divorced woman will live in. It also indicates that the divorced woman who She is looking for a good woman to marry her husband in a dream. She has a great responsibility that she wants to leave to her ex-husband now. The same applies to a divorced woman who sees that her ex-husband is marrying another beautiful and kind woman. Here it appears that

title: Interpretation of the noon prayer in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we discuss through the encyclopedia, the interpretation of the noon prayer in a dream, and prayer is considered one of the most important pillars of faith. Neither Islam nor the doctrine is valid except by taking this into account, as it is the basic pillar of the religion, and seeing prayer in a dream generally indicates the high status of faith. The dreamer is religious and worldly. We study below the interpretation of the noon prayer in a dream for a married, single, and pregnant woman. The interpretation of the noon prayer in a dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing the noon prayer in a dream has many interpretations, including: getting rid of worry and anxiety and treating mental and physical diseases. The noon prayer in a dream at the time The occasion is evidence of the dreamer’s fulfillment of his promise and sincerity. Prolonging the noon prayer kneeling is a sign of longevity and the blessing of health. The noon prayer in the Grand Mosque shows the goodness of the dreamer and the strength of his faith. The ablution of the noon prayer symbolizes the purity of the dreamer and the purity of himself. Surrendering after the tashahhud is good news for paying off debts and meeting needs. And God knows best. Interpretation of the noon prayer in a dream for a single woman. Noon prayer in the mosque is a sign of the approaching engagement and marriage contract. Praying at noon in the church for a single woman indicates that he will soon marry a person who has good qualities. Interrupting the noon prayer in a dream symbolizes the engagement of an unmarried woman to a man. Inappropriate and that this engagement will not take place. Prayer in a dream for a married woman. The dream of a married woman praying the noon prayer has good and promising connotations that we mention in the following points: Congregational prayer with the husband and children shows the goodness of this family and God’s satisfaction with it, and that He, the Most High, will bless them with much goodness and blessing in their lives. Hearing the noon prayer symbolizes her effort to preserve her home and family. Noon prayer facing other than the Qiblah is a sign of turning away from the commandment of God Almighty, the occurrence of transgressions and misdeeds, and alerting them to the need to repent to God. Noon prayer in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees that she is praying the noon prayer in the mosque, this is good news. That she will give birth easily, and that God Almighty will save her and her newborn from all evil and evil, and nourish them with abundant food. His grace. The numerous supplications in the noon prayer in a dream are evidence that God will grant her a healthy child with a good constitution and a good personality, who will help and support her. The noon prayer in a dream about a man. We tell the interpretation of the noon prayer for a man in a dream with what the scholar Ibn Shaheen said: And whoever dreams that he is praying a prayer Noon prayer, it brings the blessing of time, peace of mind and soul, and an increase in good deeds. The noon prayer in a man’s dream is a victory, honor, and high status, and it is good news that the dreamer will achieve what he desires and desires. The noon prayer in a dream indicates goodness and blessing in matters of religion and the world. If The fortuneteller saw that he prayed the false prayer on a clear day, then it indicates transcendence and victory, but if the prayer was on a cloudy day, then this is a sign that he will fall upon them and be distressed, but God Almighty will save him. By His grace. The noon prayer is an offering of the dreamer’s debts, and God knows best. It should be noted that the Friday prayer in a dream is evidence of relieving tension and removing anxiety, and the dawn prayer indicates the fulfillment of a promise that the fortuneteller expected from him.

title: A detailed interpretation of a turtle in a dream

preview.html: Learn the interpretation of a turtle in a dream and what it means in reality. A turtle is a pet that does not often get hurt. It is also one of the favorite animals of some who are interested in raising it in homes, but on the other hand, its presence in a dream is not understood or known by insight. Although it brings good or evil, the encyclopedia provides you with the most prominent interpretations of this dream for a man, according to Ibn Sirin, and its meaning for the single, the married, and the pregnant. In his worldly life. Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating turtle meat, this means that goodness awaits him, represented by a righteous deed, or that the Qur’an will be memorized. Seeing a green turtle in a dream indicates that the dreamer occupies a prominent position, and it also symbolizes knowledge and piety and may indicate Healing in the event of the dreamer’s illness, and God knows best. If a man sees in a dream that he is buying a turtle, this means that he will gain lineage from a man who has a good reputation among his acquaintances. Whoever sees in his dream that he found a turtle on the road, this indicates lost knowledge in reality. It indicates A turtle bite in a dream indicates that the dreamer will have a great position in science. Whoever sees in a dream that he is feeding a turtle, this indicates that the dreamer is fair to his parents. Interpretation of a turtle in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen agreed with Ibn Sirin that seeing a turtle in general means kindness and sustenance. Whoever sees a turtle on the roof of his house, this indicates the high status he enjoys in reality. Ibn Shaheen narrated that seeing a sea turtle in a dream means a journey. Whoever dreams of a turtle under his bed, this indicates protection in this world and livelihood. Whoever sees a turtle near the beach in In his dream, this indicates the goodness of achieving success or for the sake of knowledge. Anyone who dreams of a turtle in the yard of his house symbolizes a feeling of comfort and security in reality. Interpretation of a person’s dream: Whoever sees in her dream that she is holding a turtle in her hands, this indicates her marriage to a generous man. If An unmarried woman who sees a turtle walking indicates that she is waiting for her engagement or marriage for a long time. Contrary to the previous vision, an unmarried woman who sees a turtle walking indicates that the date of marriage is approaching, and God knows best. Whoever sees in her dream that she is kissing a turtle, this symbolizes To kindness and abundant nutrition. Interpretation of a turtle in a dream for a married woman. Whoever sees in her dream a turtle on her bed, this indicates her kindness and food in her pregnancy soon, and God knows best. Seeing turtles in general for a married woman indicates good luck and abundance of sustenance. Whoever sees in her dream that she is raising a turtle, this means that she A loyal wife who is loyal to her husband in reality, and God knows best. Interpretation of a turtle in a pregnant woman’s dream. A turtle in a pregnant woman’s dream has many meanings. It can indicate that the birth will be easy and that the child will be healthy, and it can indicate that she has given birth to a male child. A colorful turtle in a pregnant woman’s dream It indicates that she will give birth to a child

It can indicate that childbirth will be easy and that the child will be healthy, and it can indicate that she has given birth to a male child. title: Interpretation of dreams about someone I don’t know hitting a young woman with his hand or someone I know

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hitting someone I do not know or know for a young woman, as explained by the most famous interpreters, hitting is one of the inhumane acts that a person usually performs in real life, and a person can express his feelings and anger by hitting him with a hand or a stick, and hitting can cause permanent disability. For a person, when a person sees himself in a dream being beaten by someone, he feels anxious and afraid of this dream and is searching for an interpretation of this dream of being beaten by someone. For this reason, through our website, contact us. Interpretation of a dream of hitting someone I do not know. With his hand or I do not know. There are many interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s dream of hitting people with his hands, such as: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about slapping a person with his hand, that if the dreamer sees someone hitting his ear until it bleeds, this indicates that the son of the dreamer will marry him. If the dreamer sees That he beats and tortures a person, this means that someone is speaking about the dreamer with obscene and obscene words. If someone sees someone hitting another person with a stick, stick, or hand, this indicates the harm that will happen to that person. And whoever sees in a dream that he is hitting a person without knowing him This indicates that the person who is being beaten wants to harm the dreamer and calls on that person to destroy and destroy him. Ibn Sirin said: Being beaten in a dream in general with a stick, hand, or whip: advice, supplication, and good news. When a man sees in his dream that he is beating a dead person, this means that The owner of the vision will travel and find what he plans or what he wants, on the contrary, if the dead person is the one who hits the owner of the vision. And when he sees someone hitting him hard through the plate and causing him some injury, this means that the offender will make a promise to the victim but will not fulfill it. The meaning of slapping a hand in a dream for a single woman. There are many interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s dream of clapping his hand in a single woman’s dream, Such as: If an unmarried girl sees that someone is hitting her and she does not know him, this means that she will marry this person and live a good life with him. title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a dream about roses in a dream and its meaning for unmarried and pregnant women?

preview.html: What is the complete interpretation of roses in a dream and their meaning on the Hadot website, which is run by a group of dream and vision interpreters. Roses are famous for being among the trees used for decoration as well as for making beautiful perfumes and fragrances, and roses are among those things that express beauty and greatness. Another interpretation of giving roses in a dream is complete for anyone. Interpretation of dreams and visions. If you are interested in knowing the complete interpretation of seeing roses in a dream, then you should read the article. Why do you dream of seeing roses in a dream in full for a man? Why dream of giving a red rose to a man in a dream is one of the visions that indicate lies, deception, and betrayal, but God knows best. Seeing roses in a dream Complete for an unmarried young man means goodness for him and a lot of sustenance that he will receive in the next life. Giving roses in a dream Complete in a dream, Complete to people on the street, testifies to the fulfillment of the dreamer’s goals and desires in the afterlife, and God knows best. See also: Why dream of seeing rose water In a complete dream, why dream of collecting roses for a single woman? Seeing roses in a dream for an unmarried girl is a sign that she will be engaged or perhaps close to marriage in the afterlife, and God knows best. In the same way, roses in a complete dream for an unmarried girl indicate her close relationship with a suitable person from People with high morals, religion, and status. If a girl sees herself in a dream full of roses, this is a sign that she will marry someone she loves and desires, and God knows best. To see a girl in a dream full of roses means successes and successes in professional or academic life, and God knows best. See also : Why do you dream of jasmine to see it in a complete dream? Why does a married woman dream of roses in a complete dream? Seeing roses in a married woman’s dream means getting rid of her problems and starting a life free of all obstacles. In the same way, seeing white roses in a dream in full for a married woman means relief from depression and the elimination of Stress and sadness in her life, and God knows best. The gift of roses in a dream to a married woman indicates the approaching pregnancy and nourishment for a righteous heir, and God knows best. Roses in a married woman’s dream are among the good visions that indicate kindness and support for her and her husband, and God Almighty. See also: Why do you dream of seeing jasmine? In a complete dream? Why do roses dream in a pregnant woman’s dream? Seeing roses in a pregnant woman’s dream testifies to the ease of childbirth and speaks of improving her health and the health of her fetus. Seeing roses in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign that she will be blessed with a new baby and God knows what is in the womb. In the same way, seeing Roses in a pregnant woman’s dream are a sign of ending her problems, alleviating suffering, and fixing the situation with her and her husband. A rose in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the praiseworthy dreams that shows her kindness, her pregnancy, and her child. And God knows best. See also: Why dream of seeing the Kaaba in a complete dream? If you have a dream that you want to interpret, leave it in the comments below and our team will answer you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a stolen mobile phone in a dream for a single woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a stolen mobile phone in a dream. There are many good and bad dreams that one can encounter in a dream, and it is worth noting that these visions have different interpretations developed by specialized interpretive scholars. The scope of science is that the interpretation of this vision depends largely on the condition of the viewer and the scene in which he sees the mobile phone in the dream, whether it was stolen, lost, or otherwise, and through the following article we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of seeing the theft of a mobile phone in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing A stolen mobile phone in a dreamThe interpretation of a dream about seeing a stolen mobile phone in a dream has many different meanings and interpretations, and there are many details that appeared in this vision, and through the following paragraph we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about seeing a stolen mobile phone in a dream: If a man sees a stolen mobile phone in If there were people in the dream, this vision indicates that the man has a high social status, and losing a mobile phone may indicate the status he seeks. As for whether the dreamer saw a black mobile phone in a dream, this vision shows bad news that will soon come to the pioneer, and the white color shows the many fears and problems that the dreamer is exposed to in his reality. According to what commentators said, seeing a mobile phone stolen indicates an arrest. On the fortuneteller or knowing his secrets, through some people who want to harm him. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a cow in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and what it indicates. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a stolen mobile phone in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of seeing a stolen mobile phone in A dream, where many different connotations and meanings were deduced, including the following signs: Ibn Sirin explains that seeing a stolen mobile phone in a dream means that a man is afraid that something he intended to hide from everyone around him will be revealed. If he saw a girl who was planning an important event, This vision indicates that he will lose all hope related to him to complete this event. Stealing a mobile phone also indicates an attempt by a malicious person to steal valuables from them. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and what does it indicate? Interpretation of dreams of breaking a mobile phone In a dream for a single woman. After you learn about the interpretation of a dream about seeing a mobile phone stolen in a dream by Ibn Sirin, through the following paragraph we will learn about the dream interpretation of a broken mobile phone in a dream for a single girl, such as the connotations and meanings were as follows: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that Her mobile phone breaks, then this vision indicates that there is a lot of stress and insecurity in the girl’s life. As for seeing a single girl breaking a mobile phone in a dream, this vision is evidence of the girl’s feeling of disappointment with the people around her and her real reality. Also, if she sees an unmarried girl A married woman whose phone was broken in her dream, this vision is an indication of the girl’s failure to achieve many of her goals

title: Learn about the interpretation of the dream of an owl according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about an owl: Seeing an owl in a dream is an annoying and frightening dream, because it is considered a destructive and frightening bird. An owl in a dream symbolizes envy, cunning and deception. The interpretations are never bad, but they carry some interpretations and positive elements. Interpretation of a dream about an owl in a dream: The owl also symbolizes a woman who is jealous and envious of the dreamer, and the owl in a dream is evidence of a serious warning of bad news that will reach the dreamer soon. Seeing an owl in a dream is a sign of her need for positive energy to complete her life, and drawing in a dream also indicates the difficult emotional life she goes through in life. Interpretation of the dream of an owl in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of an owl in a dream as a thief or a brave thief who does not He is afraid of someone, and this vision also indicates a person who has strong authority, but he is tyrannical and unjust, and if the fortuneteller is an employer, he will lose his job. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation from Google. Interpretation of a dream about an owl in a dream for a single woman. An owl in a dream symbolizes a bird with positive meanings. If an unmarried woman sees a white owl in her dream, this indicates that the groom will propose to her and marry her well. But if an unmarried woman sees a black owl, this is not an easy and miserly matter, but if she sees a colored owl, this is a sign of false feelings from people who wish for her. Good and evil, but if an owl sees a slaughter, this indicates opportunities that the unmarried woman missed and wasted. Interpretation of a dream about an owl for a married woman: An owl in a dream for a married woman is considered a lucky bird for her and is considered a great comfort in matters related to laziness, livelihood, and money. A white owl in a married woman’s dream is evidence of joy for her, and seeing an owl’s nest indicates stability and improvement in the relationship with the husband, and an owl chick in a dream is a sign of meeting a loved one. Soon, her pregnancy, or the return of a foreigner from travel, or an expatriate, or something missing. But if the wife sees the eggs of a white owl, this means money that he will get without trouble or trouble. As for seeing the feathers of a black owl is a good vision, then feathers in a dream in general. If they are scattered on the ground or the road, it is evidence of wealth, as the leading interpreters express that seeing feathers in a dream, and for a married woman is a source of optimism and also symbolizes profit and profit in purchases and sales. Interpretation of a dream about an owl for a pregnant woman. Seeing an owl in a dream for a pregnant woman is considered a matter Well, especially if the owl is white, as seeing an owl in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes the male child Najib and his messenger in the future. A white owl in a pregnant woman’s dream is better than a black owl, because a black owl in a dream indicates an evil, evil woman, but if she sees A pregnant woman's owl eggs hatch and her due date is considered. It will be an easy and easy birth and a healthy child. Interpretation of a dream about an owl for a divorced woman: Seeing an owl in a dream for a divorced woman is considered her luck in marriage, and seeing an owl is...
